metadata.title: NESCAFÉ GOLD Smooth Instant Coffee 100 g

text: NESCAFÉ GOLD Smooth Instant Coffee 100 g

Why choose between flavour and richness if you don’t have to? Introducing NESCAFÉ GOLD Smooth Instant Coffee (100 g), a unique two-part blend of separately roasted medium and dark roast coffee beans that delivers elevated aroma and flavours, consistently in every mug.  A mix of high quality, medium roasted beans for smooth full flavour and dark roasted coffee beans for a deep richness and body, gives you a balanced, smooth cup of coffee that’s extraordinary and unlike any other.
A unique two-part blend featuring medium and dark roasted coffee beans
Easy to adjust to taste to customize to your perfect cup
Made with the passion you can expect with hand-picked coffee beans
